entry.title: mcartmell/Devel-Cover-Report-Phabricator
entry.summary:
Produce Phabricator-compatible coverage reports from Devel::Cover

Devel-Cover-Report-Phabricator

By default, this module generates a phabricator.json file in Devel::Cover's output directory. This file can then be parsed and used to provide coverage information as part of a unit test report to a Phabricator server.

Phabricator is a suite of web applications developed at Facebook for conducting code reviews, task management and much more. For documentation on configuring code coverage, see http://www.phabricator.com/docs/phabricator/article/Arcanist_User_Guide_Code_Coverage.html

INSTALLATION

To install this module, run the following commands:

perl Makefile.PL
make
make test
make install

SUPPORT AND DOCUMENTATION

After installing, you can find documentation for this module with the perldoc command.

perldoc Devel::Cover::Report::Phabricator
